## Classes

### <a name="forge_server"></a>`forge_server`

== Class: forge_server

A Puppet module to manage the Puppet Forge Server service

=== Authors

Johan Lyheden <johan.lyheden@unibet.com>

=== Copyright

Copyright 2014 North Development AB

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet

class { '::forge_server':
  scl => 'ruby193'
}
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `forge_server` class:

* [`package`](#package)
* [`scl`](#scl)
* [`scl_install_timeout`](#scl_install_timeout)
* [`scl_install_retries`](#scl_install_retries)
* [`service_enable`](#service_enable)
* [`service_ensure`](#service_ensure)
* [`service_refresh`](#service_refresh)
* [`pidfile`](#pidfile)
* [`port`](#port)
* [`bind_host`](#bind_host)
* [`daemonize`](#daemonize)
* [`module_directory`](#module_directory)
* [`http_proxy`](#http_proxy)
* [`proxy`](#proxy)
* [`cache_basedir`](#cache_basedir)
* [`log_dir`](#log_dir)
* [`debug`](#debug)
* [`forge_server_script`](#forge_server_script)
* [`user`](#user)
* [`user_homedir`](#user_homedir)
* [`provider`](#provider)

##### <a name="package"></a>`package`

Data type: `String[1]`

Optional override of package name

Default value: `'puppet-forge-server'`

##### <a name="scl"></a>`scl`

Data type: `Optional`

Name of ruby scl environment, leave undef to use system ruby

Default value: ``undef``

##### <a name="scl_install_timeout"></a>`scl_install_timeout`

Data type: `Integer`

If using ruby scl, the timeout in seconds to allow the gem installation to run

Default value: `300`

##### <a name="scl_install_retries"></a>`scl_install_retries`

Data type: `Integer`

If using ruby scl, the number of retries allowed if gem installation fails

Default value: `1`

##### <a name="service_enable"></a>`service_enable`

Data type: `Boolean`

Boolean if service should be enabled on boot

Default value: ``true``

##### <a name="service_ensure"></a>`service_ensure`

Data type: `Enum['running', 'stopped']`

Service ensure state

Default value: `'running'`

##### <a name="service_refresh"></a>`service_refresh`

Data type: `Boolean`

Boolean if config changes and package changes should trigger service restart

Default value: ``true``

##### <a name="pidfile"></a>`pidfile`

Data type: `Stdlib::UnixPath`

Path to pidfile

Default value: `'/var/run/puppet-forge-server/forge-server.pid'`

##### <a name="port"></a>`port`

Data type: `Integer`

Port to bind to

Default value: `8080`

##### <a name="bind_host"></a>`bind_host`

Data type: `Stdlib::Host`

IP or host to bind to

Default value: `'127.0.0.1'`

##### <a name="daemonize"></a>`daemonize`

Data type: `Boolean`

Boolean if should be daemonized

Default value: ``true``

##### <a name="module_directory"></a>`module_directory`

Data type: `Variant[Array[Stdlib::Unixpath], Stdlib::Unixpath]`

Directory of modules to serve, can be an array of directories

Default value: `'/var/lib/puppet-forge-server/modules'`

##### <a name="http_proxy"></a>`http_proxy`

Data type: `Optional`

Use proxyserver for http(s) connections

Default value: ``undef``

##### <a name="proxy"></a>`proxy`

Data type: `Optional`

Proxy requests to this upstream forge url

Default value: ``undef``

##### <a name="cache_basedir"></a>`cache_basedir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Unixpath`

Path where to store proxied / cached modules

Default value: `'/var/lib/puppet-forge-server/cache'`

##### <a name="log_dir"></a>`log_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Unixpath`

Path to log directory

Default value: `'/var/log/puppet-forge-server'`

##### <a name="debug"></a>`debug`

Data type: `Boolean`

Boolean to toggle debug

Default value: ``false``

##### <a name="forge_server_script"></a>`forge_server_script`

Data type: `String[1]`

Name of the script which runs the forge server, depending on ruby version installed

Default value: `'puppet-forge-server.ruby2.1'`

##### <a name="user"></a>`user`

Data type: `String[1]`

Name of the system user for forge-server

Default value: `'forge'`

##### <a name="user_homedir"></a>`user_homedir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Unixpath`

Path to the system users home dir

Default value: `'/home/forge'`

##### <a name="provider"></a>`provider`

Data type: `Enum['gem', 'puppet_gem']`

Whether to use system ruby or puppet ruby

Default value: `'gem'`
